LayoutXML:
<layout>
  <tabs>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Summary"></lang>
      </text>
      <section>
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Key Information"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="ISSUEREQ_ASSIGNEDTO" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Assigned To"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="ISSUEREQ_ASSIGNEDBY" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Assigned By"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_CCLIST" valign="top" colspan="3" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Cc"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_CATEGORY" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Category"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_EXP_END_DATE" valign="top" fieldtype="8">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Expected End Date"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_SUBJECT" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Subject"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_DESCRIPTION" valign="top" colspan="3" fieldtype="9">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Description"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section containscustominfo="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Classification Information"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_PRIORITY" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Priority"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_STATUSCODE" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Status Code"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_RELATED_TYPE" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related Type"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_RELATEDTO" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related To"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_CONTACT" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##contact##"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_RELATEDTO_ACCOUNT" valign="top" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related ##account##"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Useful Links"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="ISSUEREQ_WEBINTEGRATION_LINKS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="37" listingtype="0" fieldtype="0">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Web Integration URL Links"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Discussion"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related Discussion"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="ISSUEREQ_RELATED_RESPONSES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="53" listingtype="0" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related Discussion"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Attachments"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="true" containscustominfo="false">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Attached Notes and Documents" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" readonly="0" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_RELATED_ATTACHMENTS" fieldtype="40" relatedtype="129" listingtype="0" deftype="0" defexp="" valign="middle" colspan="4" showlabel="false">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Attached Notes and Documents" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="##notes##"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="true" containscustominfo="false">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related NOTES" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" readonly="0" fieldid="ISSUEREQ_RELATED_NOTES" fieldtype="40" relatedtype="4" listingtype="5" deftype="0" defexp="" valign="middle" colspan="4" showlabel="false">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related NOTES" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
  </tabs>
</layout>
